extendedIngredients.name: fennel bulb
extendedIngredients.original: 1 medium fennel bulb, halved lengthwise, thinly sliced crosswise
extendedIngredients.originalName: fennel bulb, halved lengthwise, thinly sliced crosswise

extendedIngredients.name: parmesan cheese
extendedIngredients.original: 1 4-ounce piece Manchego or Parmesan cheese, shaved into strips
extendedIngredients.originalName: Manchego or Parmesan cheese, shaved into strips

title: Bresaola with Arugula, Fennel, and Manchego Cheese
summary: You can never have too many hor d'oeuvre recipes, so give Bresaola with Arugula, Fennel, and Manchego Cheese a try. This recipe serves 18. Watching your figure? This gluten free and primal recipe has 51 calories, 3g of protein, and 4g of fat per serving. For 30 cents per serving, this recipe covers 2% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. If you have parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. With a spoonacular score of 29%, this dish is rather bad. Try Arugulan And Bresaola Salad, Bresaola-Wrapped Persimmons with Arugula, and fig, manchego, and arugula pizza for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Whisk olive oil and lemon juice in small bowl to blend; set dressing aside. Place 1 bresaola slice on work surface with 1 long side parallel to edge. Place 3 arugula leaves at 1 short end so that leaves extend past 1 long side. Top with layer of sliced fennel, then 2 cheese strips. Sprinkle with pepper. Drizzle with 1/2 teaspoon dressing. Starting at filled end, roll up bresaola, enclosing filling. Arrange, seam side down, on platter. Repeat with remaining ingredients to form 18 rolls total. (Can be made 4 hours ahead. Cover with plastic wrap; chill. Before serving, let stand 30 minutes at room temperature.)                                                                            *Available at Italian markets and some specialty foods stores.

steps.step: Whisk olive oil and lemon juice in small bowl to blend; set dressing aside.
Place 1 bresaola slice on work surface with 1 long side parallel to edge.
Place 3 arugula leaves at 1 short end so that leaves extend past 1 long side. Top with layer of sliced fennel, then 2 cheese strips.

Drizzle with 1/2 teaspoon dressing. Starting at filled end, roll up bresaola, enclosing filling. Arrange, seam side down, on platter. Repeat with remaining ingredients to form 18 rolls total. (Can be made 4 hours ahead. Cover with plastic wrap; chill. Before serving, let stand 30 minutes at room temperature.)
*Available at Italian markets and some specialty foods stores.
